required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Immunization Schedule of Beijing Tiantan Biological's Measles-mumps-rubella(MMR) Vaccine
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Immunization Schedules of Beijing Tiantan Biological's MMR Vaccine in 18-72 Month-Old Children

lead_sponsor.agency: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, China

collaborator.agency: Beijing Tiantan Biological Products Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, China

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of Beijing Tiantan's MMR vaccine in subjects 18 months of age and older. The MMR vaccine may be administered as a second dose to 4-6 year-old persons with one dose immunization with MMR vaccine or as a first dose to 18 month-old subjects with one dose immunization with measles-rubella(MR).

detailed_description.textblock:
This study will evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of Beijing Tiantan's MMR vaccine in subjects 18 months of age and older.
The MMR vaccine may be administered as a second dose to 4-6 year-old persons with one dose immunization with MMR vaccine or as a first dose to 18 month-old subjects with one dose immunization with MR.
Immune efficacy and safety will be compared among different immunization schedules,including inoculation doses,enhanced immunity age,vaccination interval time.
Antibody persistence of 1 dose of MMR vaccine will be evaluated in this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity of the MMR vaccines in terms of antibody concentration
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: For measles virus, seroresponse is defined as post-vaccination anti-measles virus antibody concentration (Ab conc) >200 mIU/mL. For mumps virus, seroresponse is defined as post-vaccination anti-mumps virus Ab conc >100 IU/mL. For rubella virus, seroresponse is defined as post-vaccination anti-rubella virus Ab conc >20 IU/mL.

arm_group.description: Subjects are vaccinated with MMR(Measles, mumps and rubella Combined Vaccine, Live) on 18 months old.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 30 months after two doses of MMR
arm_group.description: Subjects are vaccinated two doses of MMR(Measles, mumps and rubella Combined Vaccine, Live) on 18 month and 4 years old, sequentially.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 42 months after two doses of MMR
arm_group.description: Subjects are vaccinated two doses of MMR(Measles, mumps and rubella Combined Vaccine, Live) on 18 month and 5 years old, sequentially.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 54 months after two doses of MMR
arm_group.description: Subjects are vaccinated two doses of MMR(Measles, mumps and rubella Combined Vaccine, Live) on 18 month and 6 years old, sequentially.

intervention.intervention_name: Measles, mumps and rubella Combined Vaccine, Live
intervention.description: Subjects will be inoculated one dose of MMR vaccine and collected blood samples before and after vaccination.
intervention.arm_group_label: 30 months after two doses of MMR
42 months after two doses of MMR
54 months after two doses of MMR
